name: Tonnage per centimeter
description: Load change required to change draft by one centimeter

name: Net tonnage
description: Dimensionless index based on the total volume of cargo spaces

name: Length between perpendiculars
description: Length between the forward and aft perpendiculars

name: Speed
description: Representative speed from \ac{WFR} (service or average observed)

name: Number of trips
description: Number of trips detected from AIS data

name: At-port fraction
description: Fraction of hourly observations with operational phase ‘at-port’

name: Longest distance
description: Longest distance between consecutive locations after interpolation

name: Interpolated fraction at-sea
description: Fraction of hourly observations with operational phase ‘at-sea’ that are interpolated

name: Residual of log fuel consumption
description: Log (log1p) reported fuel consumption minus log1p calculated fuel consumption

name: Infeasible distance
description: Sum of infeasible distances between consecutive locations after interpolation

name: Admiralty instantaneous term squared
description: Aggregation of instantaneous term of (\ref{eqn:admiralty}) squared

name: Admiralty instantaneous term cubed
description: Aggregation of instantaneous term of (\ref{eqn:admiralty}) cubed

name: Admiralty rel power
description: Aggregation of relative power term of (\ref{eqn:admiralty})

name: Admiralty rel power squared
description: Aggregation of relative power term of (\ref{eqn:admiralty}) squared

name: Admiralty rel power cubed
description: Aggregation of relative power term of (\ref{eqn:admiralty}) cubed

name: Main Engine Reference Specific Fuel Consumption
description: Base value of fuel consumption rating of main engine as per IMO

name: Structural linear term
description: Aggregation of relative draft and speed

name: Structural squared term
description: Aggregation of relative draft and speed squared

name: Structural cubed term
description: Aggregation of relative draft and speed cubed
